programme.title: New Doraemon Ep137

programme.title: SMK Ep03
programme.desc: Adam menyembunyikan diri kerana takut disuntik semasa hari suntikan imunisasi. Semasa bersembunyi, dia terserempak dengan rakan-rakannya yang juga tidak mahu disuntik, namun seorang demi seorang ditangkap.

programme.title: SMK Ep04
programme.desc: Tanpa dirancang, Adam melakukan perkara yang menyebabkan Mal, Arif dan Lisa cemburu terhadapnya. Adam dianggp sengaja mahu ambil alih tempat dan kedudukan mereka, lalu mereka merancang membalas dendam.

programme.title: Kampung Boy S1 Ep01

programme.title: Dee The Series Ep11
programme.desc: Dee, bersama ibunya, Amy dan adiknya Mia memulakan hidup baru di Kuala Lumpur apabila Amy mendapat kerja baru di sebuah kolej swasta. Bermulalah satu dunia yang baru untuk Dee di kolej itu.

programme.title: Ultraman Zero The Chronicles HD Ep26
programme.desc: Ultraman Zero iaitu anak legenda Ultraseven menerima latihan daripada Ultraman Leo untuk menjadi pejuang yang berkelayakan. Apabila tanah airnya, Land of Light diancam oleh sekumpulan raksasa

programme.title: Beyblade Metal Fusion Ep10

programme.title: Nakee 2

programme.title: Senario Asam Garam

programme.title: Surga Yang Terluka

programme.title: Citra Exclusive: Cekelat Tak Semanis Honey

programme.title: Gila

programme.desc: Dihoskan oleh Jiggy Masin, saksikan sebuah 'game show' baru yang turut boleh disertai oleh penonton dan menangi hadiah menarik pada setiap minggu.

programme.title: Selera Rasa Seksa Ep08
programme.desc: Saksikan Datuk Chef Wan dalam sebuah 'game show' masakan komedi yang riuh! Pedas! Panas! Bersama selebriti terkenal tanah air.

programme.title: Kata Jihan Ep07
programme.desc: Jihan Muse kini kembali! Jom bergelak tawa sambil berbicara tentang topik menarik bersama Jihan, dan tetamu undangannya.

programme.title: Sembang Teh Tarik S2 Ep07
programme.desc: Sembang Teh Tarik musim baru yang dihoskan oleh Dato' AC Mizal menjemput artis menaiki kereta 'Vintage' dan berbual menceritakan tentang kisah hidup seseorang artis seperti Johan, Zizan & Nabila Huda.

programme.title: Layan Je! Opera Zero Ep02
programme.desc: Jom berhibur bersama kumpulan Zero dalam klip-klip yang menarik dan menghiburkan. Saksikan Opera Zero, setiap Khamis jam 9 malam.

programme.title: Layan Je! Stand Up Comedy Otai Ep02
programme.desc: Bersama 18 lagenda komedi tanah air, jangan lupa saksikan Stand Up Comedy Otai, pada setiap Khamis, jam 9.30PM, di Astro Warna & Warna HD.

programme.title: Layan Je! Rumah No. 107 S2 Ep02
programme.desc: Saksikan musim terbaru, Rumah No. 107 bersama Tok Khir, Ropie, Joey, Vicha dan ahli keluarga baru Syuk, pada setiap hari Jumaat, jam 9.00 malam hanya di Astro Warna saluran 107.

programme.title: Motif Viral Junior Ep24
programme.desc: Sebuah program yang merungkai perkara pelik dan viral yang terjadi di Malaysia. Kali ini, kita akan mendengar apa pandangan kanak-kanak terhadap perkara tersebut.

programme.title: Lawak Solo Ep08
programme.desc: Lawak Solo, pencarian bakat komedi solo pertama di Malaysia. Di hoskan oleh Johan dan Fad.

programme.title: Tele Berkembar Ep15
programme.desc: Telefilem komedi hebat dalam dua episod yang padat sendat dengan pelbagai tema dan cerita untuk hiburan anda seisi keluarga!

programme.title: Ngaroot Ep09
programme.desc: Sebuah sketsa yang menampilkan finalis MLM 2017 membawakan watak lucu yang bertemakan isu semasa. Selain itu, program ini turut memaparkan nilai murni dan pengajaran yang berguna buat penonton.

programme.title: Super Spontan All Stars Ep07
programme.desc: Saksikan kemunculan artis dan pelawak tanahair yang akan kembali bertarung di pentas Super Spontan All Stars untuk memeriahkan malam Jumaaat anda.

programme.title: Bocey & Friends Ep02
programme.desc: Bocey & Friends, rancangan sitkom yang dibintangi oleh Achey, Fad, Abam, Zulin dan artis jemputan.

programme.title: Maharaja Lawak Mega Terbaik 2017 Ep04
programme.desc: Kompilasi lawak terbaik daripada rancangan komedi mombor satu di Malaysia, Maharaja Lawak Mega 2017.

programme.title: Temasya Sukan Kelaut Ep06
programme.desc: Program sukan yang diselitkan elemen komedi, menampilkan pelawak tanah air serta selebriti sukan terkenal. Sukan sebenar diubah jadi satu bentuk sukan yang menghiburkan.

programme.title: JOZAN Ep14
programme.desc: Duo pelawak paling popular kini kembali setelah 7 tahun tidak bersama menghiburkan peminat menerusi program bual bicara terbaru yang pasti menghiburkan anda.

programme.title: Jangan Pandang Belakang Congkak 2
programme.desc: Setalah berjaya memulihkan Punai, Asmat dan Johan serta berjaya menewaskan Mustika mereka belajar untuk menangkap hantu. Lakonan Shahiezy Sam & Lisa Surihani.

programme.title: Travel Lawak Ep10
programme.desc: Sebuah program travelog yang menampilkan tiga pelawak popular iaitu Syuk, Sharif Zero, dan Mamak Puteh di mana mereka akan mengembara ke luar negara.

programme.title: Motif Sosial? Ep15
programme.desc: Kesinambungan Motif Viral, kali ini melalui eksperimen sosial yang viral dengan penampilan selebriti undangan.

programme.title: Gasing Tengkorak
programme.desc: A singer falls ills and retreats to a beautiful, secluded villa to recuperate. But she soon gets drawn into a mysterious, supernatural game where her fate lies with a spinning top.

programme.title: Indera Ke Enam
programme.desc: Since moving into the house, a woman starts experiencing strange visions. No one believes her at first, until her daughter's friend starts to investigate the history of the house.

programme.title: Mandy
programme.desc: A tale of vengeance that translates as an LSD trip in the sweltering desert heat, replete with satanic cult, biker gang, heavy metal and Nicolas Cage shooting an arrow. Nuff said. A gory fantastical treat!

programme.title: The Intruder
programme.desc: An apartment building's owner has to face his most frightening fear as his tenants are torn apart - literally, by the vengeance of demonic cobras.

programme.title: The House On Pine Street
programme.desc: A young woman expecting her first child moves into a house with her husband, unaware that it is haunted. Having had a mental breakdown before, she starts to question her own sanity.

programme.title: Kumanthong
programme.desc: Based on true events that happened in Vietnam, a deaf-mute woman marries a psychopathic murderer. She must find a way to expose him and save innocent lives, while finding a way to stay alive.

programme.title: Necromancer
programme.desc: After his family being attacked from a black magic, a young man seeks to take revenge on those who responsible for the assault and vows to destroy them from ruining the lives of his loved ones.

programme.title: Aku Tahu Kapan Kamu Mati
programme.desc: Sienna's ability to see the sign of when people will die, really frightens her. The more she tries to forget, the more people she knows died, one by one.

programme.title: Psikopat
programme.desc: A ghost who demands the settlement of her unnatural death has become a corpse collected in a bunker with other corpses.

programme.title: Check-in Shock
programme.desc: The film Check-in Shock is the basis for the story of the reality game show, Check-in Shock. With a focus on hate and malice, contestants step into the realm of curses and feuding evil spirits.

programme.title: Heaven & Hell
programme.desc: Fans of 'found-footage' horror should not miss these three short tales made up of images from surveillance cameras set up in a creepy mansion, a convenience store and finally, in a broken lift.

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: A woman, whose brother died recently, believes she can communicate with spirits. Soon, she starts getting mysterious text messages.

programme.title: Freaks
programme.desc: A disturbed father locks his seven-year-old daughter in his house, warning her of the dangers outside until a mysterious Mr. Snowcone convinces her to join him on his quest for freedom and revenge.

programme.title: Sesat
programme.desc: An e-hailing driver has strange adventures after her ignores the instructions of an old lady. He is trapped in a loop and cannot seem to get out.

programme.title: Kron
programme.desc: An adventurous expedition turns into a nightmare when Professor Daud and his team discover they are being hunted down by a mysterious creature called Kron.

programme.title: Multiverse: The 13th Step

programme.title: Memoir

programme.title: Bekas Rumah Sakit
programme.desc: A desperate mother, a sick child, an abandoned hospital.

programme.title: Midnight Man

programme.title: The Gatehouse

programme.desc: An adventurous expedition turns into a nightmare when Professor Daud and his team discover they are being hunted down by a mysterious creature called Kron.

programme.title: The Happy Trio
programme.desc: Following the lives of three downtrodden, but resilient outcasts, John Lo Mar's gritty social drama paints a sense of realism rarely seen in Hong Kong movies.

programme.title: Clan of the White Lotus
programme.desc: A hero (Gordon Liu Chia hui) must learn 'Embroidery Fist' and acupuncture to counter a villain's (Lo Lieh) deadly fight techniques.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: In this twist-filled action film, a country girl is saved by a hero and remains coveted by her jilted lover.

programme.title: The Web of Death
programme.desc: A traitorous clansman bids to locate and then unleash the deadly 'Five Venom Spider' against those who bid to stand in his way.

programme.title: The 82 Tenants
programme.desc: If you liked House of 72 Tenants, you won't want to miss out on this humorous, fun-filled sequel complete with 10 more tenants!

programme.title: The Love Eterne
programme.desc: In this award-winning classic, a beauty disguises herself as a boy to attend school yet tend to her lover. Stars Lo Ti, Ling Po.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: When deadbeats Ming and Liang stumble upon records of scandals involving government officials, what follows is a humorous misadventure of epic proportions.

programme.title: The Spiritual Boxer
programme.desc: A young man and his sifu earn a living as pseudo-ghost catchers until his sifu is arrested and an honest gal becomes his new companion.

programme.title: Men From the Gutter
programme.desc: From its evocative title to its gritty filming and gutsy plot, this sizzling crime thriller strikes a chord with audience round the world.

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: A swordsman (David Chiang) is moved to fight back after the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend murdered by a gang.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Ling Yun of 'Hellgate' plays a magician-warrior who unwittingly protects a villain from an ambush, until his wife and friend's deaths open his eyes.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: At first, a gang just wants the village locksmith to open a stolen safe, but it soon escalates into wholesale torment when they are met with resistance.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: When an argument gets out of hand between a regular Joe and a wealthy businessman, regular Joe finds himself thrust into the middle of a high stakes wager!

programme.title: The Magnificent Trio
programme.desc: A trio of heroes go up against a power-hungry Ming Dynasty official and also cross paths with three beauties.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Ding, a con woman swindles a diamond ring off a rich man, but when it ends up in another man's hands, she now has to get it back.

programme.title: The Chinese Boxer
programme.desc: A Chinese martial arts student (Wang Yu) trains hard to defeat the karate expert (Lo Lieh) who brutally killed his master and peers.

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: A clash of cultures and such ensue after Mr. Funny Bone and Big Potato open an old-fashioned healing clinic in ultra-modern Hong Kong.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: It's Shaolin versus corrupt Ching soldiers in Chang Cheh's fun-filled kung-fu showcase, filled with show-stopping martial arts sequences.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Director Chang Cheh teams up with the Five Venoms in this martial arts saga that captures the fab five at their swashbuckling best.

programme.title: The Scandalous Warlord
programme.desc: According to this sex comedy, the true power behind China's many warlords were the prostitutes that these men would visit.

programme.title: Swordsman and Enchantress
programme.desc: A woman sets up a troubled love triangle involving 2 swordsmen (Ti Lung and Lau Wing) and an enchanting lady (Ching Li).

programme.title: Mercenaries From Hong Kong
programme.desc: In Wong Jing's first modern drama spiced up by three great kung fu choreographers, stars Ti Lung, Chen Hui Min, Wang Lung Wei, Lo Lieh and Wang Yu defy death.

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Set in Seoul right after the Korean War, a kung-fu master, combat instructor, explosives expert and missiles specialist take on a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: After Ah Niu moves to Hong Kong, a kind-hearted fellow from rural China is taken advantage by cunning characters including his uncle.

programme.title: Brave Archer and His Mate
programme.desc: Fourth in the hugely popular series, the leader of 'Venom', supported by his fellow members and Brave Archer associates, sets out to defeat a mass murderer.

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: Controversial director Chu Yuan combines stars to create a masterpiece about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women expect of it.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: A grateful convict becomes his prison officer's defender after he learns that the officer's restaurant has been taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: The Big Sting
programme.desc: Director Lu Chun-ku leads Liu Yung, Liang Yun-hsin and 'Thundering Mantis,' Liang Chia-jen on a madcap quest filled with double crosses and triple plots.

programme.title: The Incredible Monk, Dragon Return
programme.desc: Ji Gong forms an alliance with people from all walks of life to save humanity. Battle-hardened General Gao dare not marry his childhood sweetheart and turns to Ji Gong for help but things go awry.

programme.title: Two Tigers
programme.desc: An inept kidnapper has the table turned on him by the wily businessman he kidnaps, and is coerced into doing his bidding. How will the story end for the captor and the captive?

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: An undercover police who infiltrated the triad and a triad mole planted into the police force must work together to survive the cutthroat underworld.

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A girl, who turns down a marriage proposal from her suitor, enters into a contract with him stating that they will reunite in five years - should they both still be single.

programme.title: The Founding of an Army
programme.desc: This HKFA nominee tells the epic story behind the founding of the People's Liberation Army in China that ultimately laid the foundation for a new republic. Featuring 60 all-star cast members!

programme.title: Viral MH000991
programme.desc: Inspired by a true story, this chilling Thai tale depicts how a gamer captures a spirit photo that she shares with friends - only to release the spirit that begins to haunt them all.

programme.title: King of Mahjong
programme.desc: This Singaporean-Malaysian comedy starring Chapman To & Mark Lee revolves around Tin Ba, whose winning streak inspires him to challenge the King of Mahjong in the world championship.

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Shot in Malaysia, this action comedy starring Eliza Sam, Joyce Cheng & Jeana Ho sees six female police recruits developing a bond as they bust crime in bikinis.

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: Winner of the Palme d'Or at the Cannes Film Festival. A shoplifter comes across a little girl in the freezing cold, whom his wife agrees to take in. But what secrets is the girl hiding?

programme.title: Enter the Fat Dragon
programme.desc: A demoted super cop who has become overweight receives a lifeline to save his career and win back his ex-fiancee when he is tasked to repatriate a Japanese fugitive.

programme.title: Line Walker
programme.desc: Nominated as New Director in 2017 HKFA, Sharmaine Sheh is back with newly joint Nicky Cheung, Louis Koo and Francis Ng in the search for the 6th undercover!

programme.title: You are the One
programme.desc: This modern-day Cinderella story brings together a man and a woman, who not only come from different worlds but get off on the wrong foot. Will their differences ruin their chance at love?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: A paralyzed & depressed HK divorcee meets his new Filipino domestic worker, who has put her dream on hold to earn a living. As each grapple with their own demons, life begins to heal them.

programme.title: Operation Mekong
programme.desc: Based on the Mekong River massacre, Zhang Han Yu & Eddie Peng star as members of a task force bent on bringing down a drug cartel, with Malaysia providing the backdrops for breath-taking action scenes.

programme.title: Concerto of the Bully
programme.desc: Starring Ronald Cheng, Cherry Ngan, Chrissie Chau, this drama is elevated by the chemistry between the leads - a kidnapped songwriter with an exceptional memory, and a street punk calmed by her music.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: This action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong's elite in the 1990s, perpetuated by billionaire & serial kidnapper Logan & his gang.

programme.title: In Your Dreams
programme.desc: Hong Kong Asian Film Festival's opening film by first-time producer, Carina Lau. When a youth who was abandoned by his mother meets a lonely teacher at school, they develop a strong bond.

programme.title: The Kiss Addict
programme.desc: This multi-nominated movie depicts a young, talented violinist named Wen Feng, who receives a kiss from a mysterious woman. It prompts them to find out the secret of the Kiss Addiction together.

programme.title: Dragons Forever
programme.desc: Jackie Chan, Sammo Hung & Yuen Biao star in this film about a company lawyer, who struggles to make a decision when his employer's shady motives become clear.

programme.title: Kill Mobile
programme.desc: Tong Da Wei & Ma Li star in the comedy of the year, in which seven friends share all messages & calls on their cell phones in a party game. Expectedly, secrets are revealed in the most hilarious way!

programme.title: The Sinking City : Capsule Odyssey
programme.desc: A group of people fight for their ideal lifestyles as they share a small living space called "Space Capsule". Starring Pakho Chao, Louis Cheung & Andrew Lam.

programme.title: Detective Chinatown 2
programme.desc: When the case of New York Chinatown godfather Uncle Qi's missing son turns into a murder investigation, the detective duo Tang & Qin team up again - this time with a little help.

programme.title: Days of Being Wild
programme.desc: This award-winning movie tells the story of Yuddy, an orphan who is callous towards any women who falls for him. One day, Yuddy sets out on a fateful journey to find his mother.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: To escape a love affair gone bad, Yanny heads to San Jose to visit an old friend, Ling, and her husband. But what seems an ideal, carefree existence hides some unspeakable secrets.

programme.title: Love Endures
programme.desc: In this 6-time 2016 ICFF nominee, Liu Kai Chi won his first MTFF Golden Butterfly Best Actor award playing an intellectually-challenged father raising his child.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: An insurance agent who finds his clients' son dead in their bathroom begins to suspect that the parents may have something to hide.

programme.title: Ricky Zoom S2 Ep214

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks S5 Ep506
programme.desc: Alvin gets a taste of his own medicine when he zaps Dave with a youth ray, turning him into an irresponsible teen.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks S1 Ep132

programme.title: Lego Friends: Girls on a Mission S3 Ep308

programme.desc: News anchor Craig Woodman goes missing, Gabby Tocamera despereately turns to Shirley Keeper for help.

programme.title: The Loud House S2 Ep205

programme.title: 44 Cats S1 Ep102

programme.desc: Lucy is annoyed that Lori and Leni have started watching her vampire show because of a cute new character.

programme.title: Terowong
programme.desc: Amran memandu keretanya melalui sebuah terowong. Keretanya tiba-tiba rosak. Amran turun dan melihat 4 orang berjubah hitam mengangkat mayat dan melepasi dia.

programme.title: Tak Beli Tak Cinta
programme.desc: Sejak pertemuan dengan Cikgu Ramli, Bibi seringkali didatangi dengan bayangan Cikgu Ramli. Isma dan Liyana hairan dengan perubahan Bibi yang sentiasa menghitung detik jam nak menjemput Raykal di sekolah.

programme.title: Lelaki Lingkungan Cinta

programme.title: Take Off
programme.desc: Rounding up five inexperienced athletes from a small Korean town with nothing to lose, they form the first Korean ski jump team in hope of winning gold.

programme.title: Parallel Life
programme.desc: After his wife is brutally murdered, a judge discovers that his life bears an eerie resemblance to that of a long-ago predecessor.

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong's dead mother returns home and tries to kill him...

programme.title: A Tale of Two Sisters
programme.desc: After spending time in a mental institution, two sisters return home to reunited with their family and inexplicable events start to occur...

programme.title: Two Faces of My Girlfriend
programme.desc: An awkward, almost 30-year-old man meets a sweet, innocent and bashful girl but he soon discovers a completely different side to her!

programme.title: Memories of the Sword
programme.desc: 3 warriors pledge to fight against an incompetent king. However, a betrayal occurs leading to the death of one of the warriors. 18 years later, the daughter of the betrayed sets out to get revenge.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: A retired contract killer investigates a kidnapping case which may involve his next of kin, all the while relentlessly chased by his last target's blood brother.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: The Divine Fury
programme.desc: After waking up with mysterious wounds on his hands, a champion fighter finds himself in an otherworldly battle against evil forces that wreak havoc in the human world.

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: Suspicion leads to hysteria when rural villagers link a series of brutal murders to the arrival of a mysterious stranger.

programme.title: Hindsight
programme.desc: A hitwoman is hired to keep a close eye on the retired mob boss, but things get complicated when they grow attached to each other at a cooking class...

programme.title: Long Live the King

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: Confession of Murder
programme.desc: A police officer haunted for failing to capture a serial killer 15 years back, returns to the case after a novelist publishes the book 'I am the Murderer', claiming responsibility for the crimes.

programme.title: Moby Dick
programme.desc: After a mysterious explosion destroys a bridge outside Seoul, three journalists dig deeper into the strange case.

programme.title: The Classic

programme.desc: A man tries to find the killer of his sister and seeks revenge by enlisting the help of a medium.
